title: Pixel 3 not sending texts
content:
My Pixel 3 does not send texts. I can receive texts, make calls and otherwise use data. There is no error message. I have reset the device and the networks. I have used safe mode. I have tried on WiFi and mobile network. I have tried using the online messages.android.com in Chrome. I reset the app. I tried a different SMS app. I switched carriers and still people just don't get my texts. It's pretty clearly something with the phone itself.

This just started one day about two weeks ago after working fine for years. I had recently started sending more texts than normal (a hundred or so per day, maybe). Nothing is working. Help.
